summary: There are a few ways people like to check the meta tags on their sites.  I previously used Metatags. io but there's also Hey Meta and probably a lot more of them around I don't know about...
title: Lens: Meta Tag Checker (Robb's Version)

summary: Another year, another instance of Krissy and I waking up our daughter with a cake on her birthday.  It’s nice to have little traditions like this.  This is also where I reiterate that my kid is the best and that I’m really glad I get to be her dad...
title: Happy Birthday, Athena
